caption.body: Pan American World Airways’ 1948 advertisement in the Saturday Evening Post promoted the luxury of Sleeperette service to Australia and New Zealand with a color illustration of a woman holding a koala. Always read the small print though: the first stop after leaving San Francisco is Hawaii! Have you ever been to Australia or New Zealand?  Image: Pan American World Airways advertisement, Saturday Evening Post, 1948. Gift of Barnaby Conrad III. 2001.038.164.034
caption.excerpt: Pan American World Airways’ 1948 advertisement in the Saturday Evening Post promoted the luxury of Sleeperette service to Australia and New Zealand with a color illustration of a woman holding a koala.
